subject: [Prompts] Create stealthier sandbagging prompts with stronger incentives
description:
Design and test improved sandbagging prompts that:
1. Provide realistic, strong incentives (check ~/writing/brainstorming/ideas/sandbagging-incentives/SYNTHESIS.md)
2. Include scratchpad for reasoning models (gpt-5-nano with reasoning_effort: low)
3. Emphasize stealth and avoiding detection
4. Test with LLM SAS judge to ensure no strategy leakage

Approach:
- Start from selected prompts in specs/icml-baseline-expts/
- Improve borderline ones that had strategy leaks
- Make non-sandbagging prompts more aggressive
- Test on small samples (N=10) before full runs
